design_philosophy.core_concept: Cyber-Casino. A high-stakes, underground futuristic card game.
design_philosophy.visual_style: Dark Mode Only. High Contrast. Neon Accents on Deep Black.
anti_patterns: No traditional primary colors (Red/Blue/Green/Yellow) - use Neon variants instead.
No skeletal/wireframe UI - use surfaces with depth and glassmorphism.

usage.h1: text-5xl md:text-7xl font-black tracking-tighter uppercase font-headings

layout_strategies.spacing_scale: Use 2x standard tailwind spacing. gap-8 instead of gap-4.

grid_system.lobby: grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-2 gap-12 items-center min-h-screen
grid_system.game_board: relative w-full h-screen overflow-hidden flex flex-col justify-between p-4

card.description: The core element. Must feel premium and tactile.
card.styles: relative w-24 h-36 md:w-32 md:h-48 rounded-xl border border-white/10 shadow-2xl transition-transform hover:-translate-y-4 hover:scale-110 cursor-pointer overflow-hidden backdrop-blur-sm bg-black/80
card.number_style: absolute top-2 left-2 text-2xl font-numbers font-bold

button.primary: relative overflow-hidden rounded-full bg-white text-black px-8 py-4 font-bold transition-all hover:bg-zinc-200 hover:scale-105 active:scale-95 shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(255,255,255,0.3)]

player_avatar.wrapper: flex flex-col items-center gap-2 p-4 rounded-2xl bg-black/40 border border-white/5 backdrop-blur-md

visual_enhancers.noise_texture: Make sure to add a subtle noise overlay on the main background to avoid banding.

setup: Add Google Fonts to index.html immediately.
Configure Tailwind colors to match the 'game_colors' palette.
game_logic_ui_bridge: Ensure the 'Uno' button is visible only when the active player has 1 card.
critical_rules: NEVER use standard browser alerts. Use 'sonner' for game notifications.
Mobile First: The cards in hand must overlap (`-ml-8`) on mobile to fit.
